bio: Rageon holds grudges for no reason. If you wake up to see him standing next to your bed...RUN!

soultimate.name: Vengeance
soultimate.description: Explode up high and crash down to do more damage.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacked, 2% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: That All You Got?

name: Rageon
